This torrent has the Kolbath Seal of Approval!

I recently paid (a reduced price, but still paid) for Office 2007, only to find that it refuses to install on my system. OpenOffice has been a nightmare. 

With the recent theft of a laptop and most of my recovery disks, I despaired... until the GrimReaper arrived. 

Excellent job, mate. ZERO problems with install. Thank you. 

-K-

quote taken from torrent information:

"Beware of KB949810 Office Genuine Advantage Notifications update, which will inactivate Office applications and display the nagging not genuine notification messages.
Office Genuine Advantage Notification is published through Windows Update and Microsoft Update, if you see it, DO NOT download and install it:)"

Although I didn't install this update, Office claimed to be un-validated? not too sure why, looked for information online, but none could be found (:
